aka: Tracker Diaries - Die Bären von Alaska(德)
this_title: The Tracker's Diary: Bears of Katmai Season 1
trans_title: Tracker Diaries - Die Bären von Alaska(德)
introduction: Join filmmaker Casey Anderson as he embeds in the Alaskan wilderness to follow the largest terrestrial carnivores in the world.S1 E1 - The Last FrontierS1 E2 - Fish Like a BearS1 E3 - A Working EcosystemS1 E4 - The Wolf and The StormS1 E5 - Neighbors, Old and NewS1 E6 - No Place Like HomeStudio: Vision Hawk Films
